text_logic_form: The triangles $PQS$ and $RQS$ are congruent to each other.
dissolved_text_logic_form: The triangles $PQS$ and $RQS$ are congruent to each other.
diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $QP$ is $2x$ units.
The length of the line $RQ$ is $3y + 8$ units.
The length of the line $RS$ is $2y$ units.
The length of the line $PS$ is $x$ units.
Point $S$ lies on the line connecting $R$ and $P$.
The line connecting $Q$ and $S$ is perpendicular to the line connecting $R$ and $S$.
line_instances: There are lines $PS$, $QP$, and $QS$, forming the triangle $PQS$.
There are lines $RP$, $RQ$, and $RS$, forming the triangle $RQS$.
